official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the classification of linear alkylbenzene sulfonates and linear alkylbenzene sulfonic acid.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the classification of linear alkylbenzene sulfonates and linear alkylbenzene sulfonic acids.
